channel.title: How do i get 525 npcs to work on 317
channel.description:
hey i got the 525 anims and gfx's in and i npc.dat the other one it loads and i can log and move places but all npcs are inv how do i fix this btw its un-renamed
can someone plz help me

item.title: How do i get 525 npcs to work on 317
item.dc:creator: @jessewhitley jessewhitley
item.description:
@jessewhitley wrote:

i got the data for the npcs i added a repack system sand made the cache unlimited also the models are not working in the client i want all 525 npc because i added all 525 anims and i am thinking of adding the 525 maps and 525 items the system for them are in its just they are inv idk why can someone help me?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get 525 npcs to work on 317

item.title: How do i get 525 npcs to work on 317
item.dc:creator: @B0SS B0SS
item.description:
@B0SS wrote:

Go through a 525+ Cache.
Find the monster you want, get the .DATs, Convert them to .MQO then back to .DAT.
Add into your preloading models folder. i think thats what you do, i could be wrong.

Read full topic
